description: Encode and parse data in the Concise Binary Object Representation (CBOR) data format (RFC7049).
name: cbor

scripts.man: mkdir -p man; for f in man_src/*.md; do b=`basename $f`; marked-man $f -o man/${b%.md}.1; gzip -9f man/${b%.md}.1; done
scripts.release: npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
